docs.lead_paragraph: A child of the streets, author JT Leroy, along with his adopted family, looks for magic at Disneyland Paris.
docs.snippet: A child of the streets, author JT Leroy, along with his adopted family, looks for magic at Disneyland Paris.

docs.lead_paragraph: 'Cheese! It's hailing cheese!'' We cover our heads. Our 8-year-old, Thor, cowers beneath us -- his parents, Astor and Speedie, and me, a surrogate brother, sister, wannabe parent -- as we form a shield between him and the miniature cubes pounding down on us. This is France, so it was only a matter of time till the cheese blasted us; we didn't expect it at the Tour de France, though.
docs.snippet: 'Cheese! It's hailing cheese!'' We cover our heads. Our 8-year-old, Thor, cowers beneath us -- his parents, Astor and Speedie, and me, a surrogate brother, sister, wannabe parent -- as we form a shield between him and the miniature cubes pounding...

docs.lead_paragraph: FRENCH fries and mozzarella sticks washed down with a can of Coke. Skittles and a cool, slushy, fruit-flavored drink. Throughout the state's 600 public school districts, this will soon be history. In many of them, it already is. Alarmed by the rise in student obesity, New Jersey is putting school cafeterias on a diet.
docs.snippet: Many school districts get a head start in making school meals healthier.
